result.reason: The user requests access to connection settings (Properties) via the tab context menu, which is currently missing.
result.approach: Add a 'Properties' menu item to the tab context menu (cmenTab) in ConnectionWindow.Designer.cs. In ConnectionWindow.cs, implement the event handler to open the ConfigWindow for the currently selected tab's connection info.
